Alexander Scriabin

Neuf Mazurkas, op. 25

1899

[IMSLP]

Total duration: 31'

  • 2. C major
  • 3. E minor
  • 4. E major
  • 5. C-sharp minor
  • 6. F-sharp major
  • 7. F-sharp minor
  • 8. B major
  • 9. E-flat minor

Recommended editions

  • Könemann · K 261 · Mazurkas & Waltzes · ed. Victor Ekimovsky
  • Peters · EP 9077d · Klavierwerke IV / Mazurken · ed. Günter Philipp
